languages.text: На вид-скрине горят алые запретительные сигилы — кто-то наложил на когитатор печать молчания.

traits.locale_text: [Draft] По экрану бегут непонятные красные надписи.

languages.text: Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.
languages.original_text: На вид-скрине горят алые запретительные сигилы — кто-то наложил на когитатор печать молчания.

traits.locale_text: Scarlet forbidding signs are blazing on the view-screen, someone put a seal of silence on the cogitator.
Scarlet forbidding signs are blazing on the view-screen, someone put a seal of silence on the cogitator.
Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.
Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.
Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.

languages.text: 视讯屏幕上闪烁着鲜红的警示文字，不知是谁在这台沉思者上施加了沉默封印。
languages.original_text: Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.

traits.locale_text: 视讯屏幕上闪烁着鲜红的警示文字，不知是谁在这台思考器上施加了沉默封印。

languages.text: 緋色の警告サインがスクリーン上で煌々と光っている。誰かが考算機に沈黙の封印を施したようだ。
languages.original_text: Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.

traits.locale_text: 緋色の警告サインがスクリーン上で煌々と光っている。誰かが考算機に沈黙の封印を施したようだ。

languages.text: Des symboles écarlates inquiétants brillent sur l'écran. Quelqu'un a placé un sceau de silence sur le cogitateur.
languages.original_text: Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.

traits.locale_text: Des symboles écarlates inquiétants brillent sur l'écran. Quelqu'un a placé un sceau de silence sur le cogitateur.

languages.text: La videopantalla brilla con señales de prohibición de color escarlata: alguien ha colocado un sello de silencio en este cogitador.
languages.original_text: Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.

traits.locale_text: La videopantalla brilla con señales de prohibición de color escarlata: alguien ha colocado un sello de silencio en este cogitador.

languages.text: Purpurne Verbotsschilder leuchten auf dem Vid-Bildschirm ... jemand hat den Cogitator mit einem Siegel des Schweigens belegt.
languages.original_text: Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.

traits.locale_text: Purpurne Verbotsschilder leuchten auf dem Vid-Bildschirm ... jemand hat den Cogitator mit einem Siegel des Schweigens belegt.

languages.text: Video ekranında seni uyaran kızıl semboller beliriyor. Birileri kavramsayara sessizlik mührü vurmuş.
languages.original_text: Scarlet forbidding signs blaze on the vid-screen — someone has placed a seal of silence on the cogitator.
